Port Hills fire: State of local emergency declared; helicopters battle large fire in Christchurch; Princess Margaret Hospital and residents evacuated https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fire-crews-responding-to-large-blaze-on-christchurchs-port-hills/BJJJRXVMVZGQ7GROKCHXAA5FI4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/fire-crews-responding-to-large-blaze-on-christchurchs-port-hills/BJJJRXVMVZGQ7GROKCHXAA5FI4/ Pierre Nixon, Sam Sherwood, Anna Leask"It seems to be a fast-moving thing," Fenz tells evacuated Christchurch residents. Photo / George Heard
